meanings.definition: A metric unit of square measure equal to 10,000 square meters.
meanings.sent1: The farm covered several hectares of land.
meanings.sent2: The park was vast, spanning many hectares.
meanings.sent3: I tried to fit a hundred hectares into my tiny backyard - it was a funny thought!
meanings.sent4: Her love for nature was as wide as a field of hectares.
meanings.sent5: The hectares of forest stretched endlessly, a sea of green.

meanings.definition: An area of land measuring 100 meters by 100 meters.
meanings.sent1: The soccer field was exactly two hectares in size.
meanings.sent2: The construction site covered several hectares of ground.
meanings.sent3: I imagined a hundred hectares of chocolate - what a delicious dream!
meanings.sent4: His backyard felt like a couple of hectares of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The hectares of farmland were neatly divided into plots, like a giant quilt.
